message:
In celebration of our newly launched website designed using Joomla and integrated with WHMCS we are holding a sale on all Shared and Reseller Hosting Accounts

Don't miss out on this deal. 
Use Coupon Code: NewSite

Hog Wild Host offers secure web hosting at an affordable price with 24x7x365 technical support. Whether you are a starting a blog, web forum, or gaming community, Hog Wild Host provides you with everything needed to get started. We guarantee your satisfaction with our services that we even offer a True 30 day money-back guarantee.


25% OFF your first month of service. COUPON CODE: NewSite
Visit: http://www.HogWildHost.com

Why Choose Hog Wild Host?
•	24x7x365 premium sales and support
•	Reliable and Secure Web Hosting
•	30 day money back guarantee
•	All hosting packages come with a free domain when ordering 6 or 12 months of hosting
•	We can be contacted via Phone Sales & Support, Live Chat Sales & Support, HelpDesk, 
or by Instant Messenger.

All Packages Include:
•	UNLIMITED Domains
•	Unlimited Email Accounts
•	Unlimited Sub domains
•	Unlimited MySQL Databases
•	cPanel and more...
